description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任山东省人民政府副省长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, formerly serving as the Vice Governor of the Shandong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省的省级人民政府。
description.en: The provincial people's government of Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省枣庄市的人民政府。
description.en: The people's government of Zaozhuang City, Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾是山东省人民政府负责机械工业事务的组成部门。
description.en: A former department of the Shandong Provincial People's Government responsible for machinery industry affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东省淄博市的市级委员会。
description.en: The municipal committee of the Communist Party of China in Zibo City, Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东省济南市的市级委员会。
description.en: The municipal committee of the Communist Party of China in Jinan City, Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省济南市的人民政府。
description.en: The people's government of Jinan City, Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 山东省滨州市下辖的市辖区。
description.en: A district under the administration of Binzhou City, Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 于1973年9月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in September 1973.
Served as Vice Mayor of Zaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 曾任山东省机械工业厅厅长。
description.en: Served as Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Machinery Industry.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共淄博市委书记。
description.en: Served as Secretary of the Zibo Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共济南市委副书记。
description.en: Served as Deputy Secretary of the Jinan Municipal Committee of the CPC.

position.zh-cn: 市长, 市政府党组书记
position.en: Mayor, Secretary of the Municipal Government's Party Leadership Group

description.zh-cn: 曾任济南市市长、市政府党组书记。
description.en: Served as Mayor of Jinan and Secretary of the Municipal Government's Party Leadership Group.

description.zh-cn: 于2011年11月25日被任命为山东省副省长。
description.en: Was appointed as Vice Governor of Shandong Province on November 25, 2011.

position.en: Specially Invited Consultant for the Provincial Government

description.zh-cn: 自2013年2月起任山东省政府特邀咨询。
description.en: Served as a specially invited consultant for the Shandong Provincial Government since February 2013.
Zhang Jianguo is from Zhanhua, Shandong.
